physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Several painful, friable vascular noduloulcerative skin lesions on both upper extremities.
Increasing pain; therapy with doxycycline was discontinued.
Worsening erythema and pain at the excisional site.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Condition worsened after excision; admitted for intravenous therapy.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bone marrow biopsy results indicated 50% involvement with follicular lymphoma.
Progression of orf lesions; increased topical cidofovir to 6%.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Lesions have continued to progress despite previous treatments.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Distal digit lesions continuing to progress.
Marked improvement in all lesions after initiating imiquimod.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant improvement noted after starting imiquimod treatment.
Complete resolution of lesions noted at hospice admission.
